bug.author: leemgs
bug.summary: Source: The file format of source code is not normal.
bug.description:
It is strange. It seems that the file format of source code files is not normal.
file format of source code (e.g. *.c)
<denchmark-code>$ find . -name *.c | xargs file ./tensor_aggregator/tensor_aggregator.c: C source, ASCII text ./tensor_filter/tensor_filter.c: HTML document, ASCII text ./tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow_lite.c: C source, ASCII text ./tensor_filter/tensor_filter_custom.c: C source, ASCII text ./tensor_filter/tensor_filter_tensorflow.c: C source, ASCII text ./tensor_sink/tensor_sink.c: C source, ASCII text ./tensor_transform/tensor_transform.c: HTML document, ASCII text ./tensor_split/gsttensorsplit.c: HTML document, ASCII text ./tensor_demux/gsttensordemux.c: HTML document, ASCII text ./tensor_mux/gsttensormux.c: HTML document, ASCII text ./nnstreamer/tensor_meta.c: C source, ASCII text ./nnstreamer/nnstreamer.c: C source, ASCII text ./nnstreamer/tensor_common.c: C source, ASCII text ./tensor_converter/tensor_converter.c: HTML document, ASCII text ./tensor_saveload/tensor_load.c: HTML document, ASCII text ./tensor_decoder/tensordec.c: HTML document, ASCII text ./tensor_merge/gsttensormerge.c: HTML document, ASCII text
</denchmark-code>

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/692>#692</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.

git blame:

HTML document, ASCII text is caused by GStreamer Usage Documentation. Actually, later, to be good-plugins, we need to add such SECTION for all elements. This is not an issue of nnstreamer. It's an issue of file.
